title: Quiet clean and spacious. Two sky lights. Prime location. Near All.
posting_body: ['Brand new listing.', 'Still work in progress - new photos coming.', 'Check back in or please feel free to inquire now.', 'Will be freshly painted and cleaned up.', '1-Bedroom apartment.', 'Super quiet and peaceful.', ' Large eat-in kitchen with plenty of cabinet space and countertops and will fit a dining table.', 'Clean mint bathroom with a skylight and a tub.', 'Hardwood flooring throughout out.', 'High ceilings.', 'Good closet space.', 'Pivate entry with only 1 neighbor.', 'Prime Ridgewood, few minutes to the M train and under 10 minutes to the L as well numerous buses.', 'Near all.', ' Neighborhood amenities, shops, groceries , laundrymats, banks, drugstores, pharmacies and all else.', 'Walk to Fresh Pond, Myrtle and  Forest.', 'Enjoy a variety of restaurants, cafes, bakeries, pizzerias and  all the new trendy spots as Ridgewood continues to grow and expand.', 'Pets are accepted strictly on case to case basis as per owners discretion.', 'Video available upon request', 'If you  are interested in this apartment or any of my other strictly exclusive Astoria, Ridgewood, Bushwick, Glendale, and Middle Village listings, please register your inquiry by replying to this post.', 'Please feel free to provide any information you consider pertinent to your search.', 'Ridgewood Based Independent Broker.', 'Representing strictly hands on local owners of small buildings and houses.', 'No large buildings or impersonal managements.', 'Andrea Bohackova', 'Licensed Real Estate Broker', 'Sales Rentals Property Management', 'Manhattan Queens Brooklyn', '917-291-2149', '<URL>', '<URL>', 'Andrea Bohackova Licensed Real Estate Broker does Business in Accordance With the Federal Fair Housing Law.', 'All information furnished herein is from sources deemed reliable.', 'No representation is made by Andrea Bohackova Licensed Real Estate Broker nor is any to be implied as to the accuracy thereof and all information is submitted subject to errors, omissions, change of price, prior sale or lease, or withdrawal without notice.', 'All dimensions are approximate.', 'For exact dimensions, please hire your own architect or engineer.', 'Regarding Leasing Only: Applicants Must Demonstrate their ability to pay rent either through employment or other means.']
